title: Q: how to generate my own pb files to C++ Predictor
body_html:
Now I had trained a model used python interface. and now I wanna to save the trained paramters and the net model to pb file format which can be loaded by ReadProtoFromFile later used C++ interface.
But I cannot find out how to generate the two file(init_net.pb & predict_net.pbtxt)。
Can someone tell me, thanks very much.
body_text:

body:
Now I had trained a model used python interface. and now I wanna to save the trained paramters and the net model to pb file format which can be loaded by `ReadProtoFromFile`  later used C++ interface.
But I cannot find out how to generate the two file(init_net.pb & predict_net.pbtxt)。
Can someone tell me, thanks very much.
